DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether inversion ( specific yoga posture heart high head ) dynamic static yoga posture affect heart rate variability , oxygen uptake , blood pressure , blood parameter objective measure health , variety subjective objective measure health female male individual Sweden .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Yoga Objective Self-reported Health Indicators Among Female Male Individuals
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , control trial involve 44 male female Sweden investigate whether yoga inversion semi-inversions dynamic static yoga posture affect follow variable : heart rate variability , oxygen uptake , anthropometric variable , common symptom general practice , sleepiness , sleep quality recovery/recuperation sleep , blood pressure , blood lipid , blood protein , blood sugar , salivary cortisol , hand grip strength , relaxation recovery perceive stress , self-rated health , rating perceived exertion , satisfaction life , work-family conflict . Participants divide intervention group passive control group . The intervention group participate six ten week yoga class . The class hold 1-2 time week approximately one hour include yoga pose breathe technique . The control group participate intervention conduct live usual . The variable assess baseline ; end intervention ; three , six , twelve month end intervention .
DOC.criteria: Aged 2040 year old Aged 40 year Takes medication high blood pressure strong medication Recently operation Diagnosed eye disease ( e.g. , glaucoma ) Diagnosed depression burnout syndrome Diagnosed serious back neck problem Participates intense physical activity week Has digestive problem acid reflux Serious disorder affect ability yoga posture
